name: Nuclear Fall
description:
You wake up in a deserted wasteland, remembering nothing of what happened, and nothing in sight except a huge atomic bomb stuck in the ground, and a couple of letters left behind by god knows who. Controls:
  • Movement and Camera: WASD and Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Run: Shift
  • Crouch: Control

Tips: Crouch in order to read letters on the ground, and remember to move fast, your suit wont hold for long! The closer you are to death, the louder you'll hear your heartbeat!

(Ctrl + W is a shortcut for closing the tab in chrome, so try to avoid pressing them both at the same time!)

All references for assets used are in the "Assets Used" text file.
